titles.title: A bill to improve the monitoring and reporting of propane stocks and days of supply by the Administrator of the Energy Information Administration with regard to propane export volumes, and for other purposes.

A bill to improve the monitoring and reporting of propane stocks and days of supply by the Administrator of the Energy Information Administration with regard to propane export volumes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Energy Information Administration to include propane export information in certain data published relating to propane inventories.
